content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad we are on the same page regarding the price. Let's negotiate. What is your offer for this fantastic, newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center? Remember, it's in the perfect location, close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the excellent location and features of the apartment, I propose a rental price of 550 Euros per month. I believe this offer is fair and competitive while still fitting my budget constraints.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, Maryam. However, I must admit that I was expecting a higher offer, considering the exceptional location and features of this apartment. I hope you understand that as a landlord, I strive to rent out my property for the highest possible price. I am willing to continue negotiating, but I believe the price should be higher.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While I recognize your need to obtain the maximum rent, I must maintain my budget limitations. With deep regret, I don't want to continue the negotiation due to the proposed increase, as it exceeds my financial capacity. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
